scripts.test:modified: git diff --name-only HEAD $(git merge-base HEAD origin/main) -- ./declarations/ | grep -v .history | grep -v .filters | sed 's/declarations\///g' | sed 's/.json//g' | sed 's/.*/"&"/' | xargs -r npm test
scripts.track:modified: git diff --name-only HEAD $(git merge-base HEAD origin/main) -- ./declarations/ | grep -v .history | grep -v .filters | sed 's/declarations\///g' | sed 's/.json//g' | sed 's/.*/"&"/' | xargs -r npm run track
